title: What is the Munich tennis schedule?
description: The BMW Open by Bitpanda continues Friday in Munich. Top seed Alexander Zverev and second seed Ben Shelton headline the action, with semi-final places on the line. View Friday's full order of play below (how to watch).  ORDER OF PLAY - FRIDAY, 18 APRIL 2025 Center Court - start 11:00 a.m. [5] Francisco Cerundolo (ARG) vs David Goffin (BEL) Luciano Darderi (ITA) vs [2] Ben Shelton (USA) [1] Alexander Zverev (GER) vs Tallon Griekspoor (NED) Fabian Marozsan (HUN) vs Zizou Bergs (BEL) Court 1 - start 2 p.m. Andre Goransson (SWE) / Sem Verbeek (NED) vs [WC] Jakob Schnaitter (GER) / Mark Wallner (GER) Para Court - start 11 a.m. Allianz Para Trophy - [1] Alfie Hewett (GBR) vs Joachim Gerard (BEL) Followed By Allianz Para Trophy - Gaetan Menguy (FRA) vs [2] Gustavo Fernandez (ARG) Not Before 1:30 p.m. Allianz Para Trophy - Nico Langmann (AUT) / Christoph Wilke (GER) vs [2] Joachim Gerard (BEL) / Maikel Scheffers (NED) Not Before 3 p.m. Allianz Para Trophy - [1] Alfie Hewett (GBR) / Gordon Reid (GBR) vs Nicolas Charrier (FRA) / Gaetan Menguy (FRA) [NEWSLETTER FORM]
excerpt: The BMW Open by Bitpanda continues Thursday in Munich. Fourth seed Ugo Humbert and fifth seed Francisco Cerundolo headline the action, with quarter-final places on the line.
text: Munich View the full Friday order of play for Munich April 17, 2025 BMW Open by Bitpanda The BMW Open by Bitpanda is now an ATP 500 event. By ATP Staff The BMW Open by Bitpanda continues Friday in Munich. Top seed Alexander Zverev and second seed Ben Shelton headline the action, with semi-final places on the line. html:
Munich

View the full Friday order of play for Munich

April 17, 2025

BMW Open by Bitpanda

The BMW Open by Bitpanda is now an ATP 500 event. By ATP Staff

The BMW Open by Bitpanda continues Friday in Munich. Top seed Alexander Zverev and second seed Ben Shelton headline the action, with semi-final places on the line.

View Friday's full order of play below (how to watch). 

ORDER OF PLAY - FRIDAY, 18 APRIL 2025
Center Court - start 11:00 a.m.
[5] Francisco Cerundolo (ARG) vs David Goffin (BEL)
Luciano Darderi (ITA) vs [2] Ben Shelton (USA)
[1] Alexander Zverev (GER) vs Tallon Griekspoor (NED)
Fabian Marozsan (HUN) vs Zizou Bergs (BEL)

Court 1 - start 2 p.m.
Andre Goransson (SWE) / Sem Verbeek (NED) vs [WC] Jakob Schnaitter (GER) / Mark Wallner (GER)

Para Court - start 11 a.m.
Allianz Para Trophy - [1] Alfie Hewett (GBR) vs Joachim Gerard (BEL)

Followed By
Allianz Para Trophy - Gaetan Menguy (FRA) vs [2] Gustavo Fernandez (ARG)

Not Before 1:30 p.m.
Allianz Para Trophy - Nico Langmann (AUT) / Christoph Wilke (GER) vs [2] Joachim Gerard (BEL) / Maikel Scheffers (NED)

Not Before 3 p.m.
Allianz Para Trophy - [1] Alfie Hewett (GBR) / Gordon Reid (GBR) vs Nicolas Charrier (FRA) / Gaetan Menguy (FRA)
